report.title: Results overview - taxonomic output
report.description: A report to display the taxon group details on the Results Overview page.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl JOIN taxa_taxon_list_attribute_values ttlav on ttlav.taxa_taxon_list_id=cttl.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id and ttlav.taxa_taxon_list_attribute_id in (#all_trait_attr_ids#) and ttlav.deleted=false #joins#

joins.join: join cache_occurrences_functional o on o.website_id in (#website_ids#) and o.survey_id=(select survey_id from samples where id=#sample_id#) and o.sample_id=#sample_id# and o.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id=cttl.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id
join scratchpad_list_entries sle on sle.entry_id=cttl.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id and sle.scratchpad_list_id=#sample_id#

param.name: all_trait_attr_ids
param.description: Comma separated list of the taxa taxon list attribute ids that hold species traits.

column.name: ret
column.sql: count(distinct cttl.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id) * 100 / ( select count(distinct cttl.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id) from cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl #joins# )
